body.name: BuTure Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 500W 38KPA Stick Vacuum with Color Touch Display, Up to 55Mins, Rechargeable Cordless Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Carpet Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 23 hrs 27 mins
features: 💝[Upgraded Color Touch Screen] Compared with traditional vacuum cleaners, BuTure cordless vacuum is equipped with a color touch screen. By pressing the "+/-" button, you can change the three cleaning modes. (Eco/Standard/Boost). You can track the status of battery level, suction level, brush roller tangled and dust sensor blocked in time for a smart cleaning experience.

💝[38KPA & 500W Powerful Suction] Forget those weak vacuums that always have residue, our BuTure cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with 500W powerful motor to ensure an unprecedented suction up to 38kPa, dedicated to picking up all surface debris and deeply embedded dirt, beats 90% of the vacuum cleaners on the market.

💝[55 Minutes Runtime] The cordless stick vacuum is equipped with a 2200mAh 7-cell battery that ensures a thorough cleaning of an entire 200㎡ house, with a maximum cleaning time of 55 minutes. (NOTE：20 min. at high power, 55 min. at low power). The battery can be removed and replaced with one button. Spare battery is available in the store for longer runtime. Fully charged in 4-5 hours.

💝[Upgraded 2-in-1 Tangle-free Roller] Hard/soft bristles are integrated together on one tangle-free roller that works excellently on carpets and floors. With built-in comb structure and V-shaped roller, JR700 vacuum cleaner truly realizes no tangle of hair. It is the perfect choice for families with pets.

💝[Worry-Free Service] The JR700 stick vacuum cleaner is equipped with crevice brush, round brush and telescopic tube, you can easily clean dust or pet hair from ceilings, sofas, carpets, hard floors and crevices. BuTure provides 3-year free warranty and 7*24 after-sales service for valued customers after registration, enjoying a high-quality buying experience!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How long is the battery life on this model? Can I get an extra battery? 1. Energy-saving mode 40-55 mins, MAX mode 15-20 mins.Battery life depends on the setting and surfaces, so it mightn‘t always be exactly what we list. 2. If you have a larger space to clean,search B0BZ7WMJNK to get a spare. Suction reduction after a few time using? 1. Dump the dust in the dust cup. 2. Clean the metal filter and filter cotton in the dust cup or replace the filter HEPA. 3. Clean up the garbage attached in the electric roller brush Why a sudden stop when the machine is working? 1. Try to check if the power brush is stucked with foreign matters or hair. If so, take them out and clean it. 2. Try to check if the dust cup needs cleaning (filter cotton, air inlet sponge)

Extra Battery for JR700 Vacuum Replacement Battery 2200mAh, take turns to replace to use and extend battery life. The charging port is on the battery. ASIN: B0BZ7WMJNK Extra Filters for JR700 Vacuum Replace the filter every 2-3 months to remain the performance of vacuuming ASIN: B0C32WD32H Charger for JR700 Vacuum Only use the original charger for charging. NOTE: Do not use the battery vacuum cleaner while charging. ASIN: B0BZ7TSL1B Soft Hose for JR700 Vacuum The flexible hose can extend your cleaning area to every corner of your home and even in your car. (Additional purchase is required.) ASIN: B0C46K38VV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use with strong suction for all kind of floors.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum has it all. Strong suction, one hand use, easy to read display, adjustable attachments, separate spinning brush for all kind of floors like carpet or hardwood, lights at the bottom of the brush attachment to see where you need to go over, big dust bin which is very easy to clean with 2 replacement filters included, long lasting Lithium Ion rechargeable battery pack with charger, adjustable hose extension made of aluminum and a hook to mount on the wall for secure placement when this wonderful vacuum is not needed. We have cats and after one day of use I can say this vacuum is the best I ever had. It cleans hair so easy and pics up cat food crumbs. I can highly recommend this vacuum.

reviews.reviewerName: A man from the UniverseA man from the Universe
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is truly upgraded - BuTure Cordless Cleaner.
reviews.reviewText: it is a very impressive upgrade. I have the previous version of this cordless vacuum cleaner. The new brush head becomes much lighter than its predecessor. it is much more comfortable to handle. The light on the brush head also becomes brighter. I love this function. I have Dyson and LG cordless vacuums, but both do not have a light on the brush head.The new touchscreen display shows the suction power level and percentage of the battery. I love a touch button for changing suction power. My home has both hardwood floors and carpet. the new brush head works on both surfaces and sucks the dust not only in front of the brush head but also around the side in the range of 2-3 inches. I am impressed by its improved suction power.In addition, the price of an upgraded vacuum cleaner is reasonable.The battery life is about 25 to 30 minutes when medium and high suction power are used 20% of the time. I hope the manufacturer provides an additional battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally worth it
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an affordable cordless vacuum and this is exactly what I needed. It’s lightweight, picks up everything. Works perfect for our carpet and wood floor. We have two toddlers and it’s the most convenient cleaning device we have in the house. Highly recommend it!! We love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good suction power
reviews.reviewText: Good suction power on battery. Light weight. Touch screen is a nice touch. Battery lasts long enough and stays charged in storage. Overall pretty happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alot of power
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum has alot of power I love how long the battery lasts and how lightweight it is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great stick vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was impressed from the moment that I opened the box. The packaging is well done and everything is protected. The headlight is a must and shows up an unbelievable amount of dirt and dust. Suction is outstanding. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vacuum with advanced features!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The BuTure JR700 cordless vacuum is a remarkable cleaning device that combines power and versatility. With its strong suction and cordless design, it effortlessly tackles dirt, debris, and pet hair on various surfaces. The vacuum's motorized brush roll attachment ensures deep cleaning of carpets, while the crevice tool and upholstery tool provide access to tight spaces and furniture. Its large dustbin capacity reduces the need for frequent emptying, and the ergonomic design makes it easy to maneuver. Overall, the BuTure JR700 offers a convenient and efficient cleaning experience that is hard to beat. It has suction block detection as well as various levels of suction to tackle any cleaning task.This really is a standout product. Its exceptional suction power, cordless design, and versatile attachments make it a reliable cleaning companion. With its user-friendly features and comfortable handling, this vacuum provides a hassle-free cleaning experience for any home. Definitely keeping this brand in mind the next time we are shopping for a vacuum. Highly reccomend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super light weight vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This stick vacuum is great! I love the fact that there is a light! It makes it so much easier to see Hair on a hardwood floor. As well as getting under a couch and or the bed to find dust bunnies. This is a super lightweight vacuum. I love the fact that the length is extendable. Definitely will purchase again. It is also super convenient that you can see the percentage of the battery on the handheld device itself.

My Dyson vacuum only lasts a couple of minutes due to battery issues, so I wanted to try out this vac given it was a third of the price of a new Dyson vac.Pros:- Love the adjustable handle - makes it easier when my toddler wants to help vacuum- there’s a light on the brush head when cleaning closets or underneath furniture- good suction with three different settings- great battery life with digital indicator on remaining battery; battery is also removable to make charging very easy- large waste container that’s easy to emptyCons:- the unit is a bit heavier than Dyson (but not by much)- the Hepa filter needs to be replaced every few months (it’s not washable). The vac includes three filters.

The media could not be loaded. Franchement nickel, le design s'est amélioré par rapport à la génération d'il y a deux ans, l'autonomie est toujours aussi bonne pour mon appart (60m²), l'appareil n'est pas très bruyant et pourtant assez puissant pour un usage quotidien. Je l'utilise vraiment tous les jours en mode brossette, et un jour sur deux en mode balai et c'est top ! Je recommande.

The media could not be loaded. Nachdem wir seit einiger Zeit einen anderen Akku-Staubsauger in Verwendung haben und das kabellose Saugen nicht mehr missen möchten, sollte ein zweiter Akku-Sauger fürs Erdgeschoss her.Der BuTure JR700 macht einen sehr wertigen Eindruck und lässt nichts zu Wünschen übrig:- Die Saugleistung lässt sich in drei Stufen einstellen (siehe Video) - auf maximaler Stufe saugt er besser als unser alter Akku-Staubsauger.- Teppichbürste (siehe Foto): Hat nicht jeder Akkusauger, ist für uns aber ein Must-have.- Klar lesbares Display (siehe Foto) mit präziser Akkustand-Anzeige in % - so erlebt man keinen überraschenden Stopp, weil der letzte von drei Balken doch schneller aufgebraucht war als gedacht...- Große Akku-Kapazität: Der Akku schafft mehrmals die ca. 70m².- Der Sauger steht frei: Sehr praktisch, wenn man ihn einfach irgendwo in die Ecke stellen kann und er dann auch einfach stehen bleibt, ohne, dass man was zum Anlehnen suchen muss.- Umfangreiches Zubehör: Alle möglichen Düsen für Polster oder auch das Auto sind dabei.Fazit: Wertiger Sauger mit ordentlicher Leistung, gutem Akku und einigen praktischen Features. Was will man mehr?

The media could not be loaded. Ottimo aspirapolvere , ho acquistato già un suo predecessore che è durato per molto tempo . Questa versione è molto migliorata , ha una maggiore potenza di aspirazione fino a 400W , 3 velocità di pulizia , display touch molto semplice e intuitivo e led incorporato sulla spazzola . Come suo fratello quello più famoso e meno accessibile . La grande novità che più mi ha colpito , è che nn bisogna più tenere il grilletto premuto . Cosa che suo fratello famoso ,ancora nn ha migliorato . Nel video in allegato ho posizionato a terra polvere relativa ad un altro aspirapolvere , cous cous e farina . Potete vedere che già alla minima velocità ha adempito più che egregiamente al suo lavoro . Il display visualizza la percentuale di carica della batteria così da averla sempre sotto controllo e nn rischiare di lasciare il lavoro a metà . Alla massima velocità dura più di 1h e 20 min alla minima nn ho provato ma sicuramente i tempi saranno raddoppiati . La batteria è intercambiabile e quindi se ne può acquistare un altra di scorta . Nella scatola c’è il manico telescopico( nn scontato che sia telescopico , perché si può accorciare e allungare all’occorrenza ) , motore , spazzola led , un puntale per la pulizia degli angoli , una spazzola piccola per divano ecc , due filtri di scorta , cavo e dispositivo per il collegamento a parete della carica . Veramente ben accessoriato , leggero e indispensabile per la pulizia giornaliera . Al momento ne sono entusiasta . Mi riservo ulteriori commenti futuri sulla durabilità della batteria e del dispositivo

I needed an upgrade after my dyson v7 battery died, so I tried this new model from buture. I am pretty happy with it overall, the battery lasts fairly long and the suction is strong enough for a stick vac. The graphite design in red and black looks awesome. The screen led for status and such is also a very neat feature to have. I would recommend this product!
